channel.title: Error When Trying To Run RicScape Server
channel.description:
when i double click on run.bat i get this error, then it xs itself out:Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoclassdeffoundError:server
Please Help!

item.title: Error When Trying To Run RicScape Server
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Andy Mod Andy
item.description:
@Mod_Andy wrote:

Right Click on Run Server , Then Click Edit and Change the Code you Have there and Change it to this :

@echo off title Runserver "D:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_01\bin\java" -cp . -Xmx500m server pause

If Its Nots that Then You Need to Compile your Server

Read full topic
item.source: Error When Trying To Run RicScape Server
